title: Splunk Admin & Developer, Enterprise Technology Services
summary: At Apple, we rely on our employees diverse set of backgrounds and perspectives to champion innovation through extraordinary ideas to surprise and delight our customers. These ideas can come from anywhere. Will that next phenomenal idea come from you? Apple IS&T Splunk team is seeking an outstanding hands-on Splunk administrator with passion for managing multiple large Splunk enterprise clusters handling high data volume, which has a diverse set of use cases. This is an excellent opportunity for a self motivated, enthusiastic, results oriented person to administer Splunk deployments which enable Apple business. Enjoy the benefits of working in a fast growing business where you are encouraged to “Think Different” and where your efforts play a key role in the success of Apple’s business.
description: Work with various Apple teams to onboard logs to Splunk, understand their requirements, develop searches and dashboards. Work on performance enhancement of Splunk searches, dashboards, and ingestion. Troubleshoot Splunk deployments. Develop and manage custom python scripts to integrate with Splunk.
preferred_qualifications:
Proficiency in a programming language (e.g. Python).
Proven ability to manage projects with on-time delivery.
Demonstrated capability to look beyond the curve and add value to user teams.
Familiarity and implementation knowledge of cloud technologies.
